name: Workhorse
tagline: Washington Brand and Creative Content Agency
description:
Workhorse is a full-service design studio in Washington D.C. specializing in no-bullshit, high-quality strategy, design & development.
Work is our favorite four-letter word.
We like to say our team is more than a “band of creatives.” Like a lot of other groups, we bring our personal styles and life experiences to every project—but it’s really our collective skills and combined experience that set us apart.
